metadata.synopsis: A mystic comments that they feel the power that once resided in an abandoned chapel. Shadowheart responds. Neither of them recognise which god this place is dedicated to.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I feel a presence here - a power. The patron god of this place?
1.context: NodeContext: Player is stepping into an abandoned chapel and still feels the holy presence of the goddess Selune (seh-LOON-eh). She is a tranquil, protective deity.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Whoever that even is. No intact symbols here, no dedications - nothing.
0.context: NodeContext: Mocking her companion's pious reference to the moon goddess, of whom she is no fan.
